alert.note: Alert for Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued September 23 at 1:31PM MDT until September 24 at 9:00AM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Low temperatures of 28 to 32 degrees. * WHERE...Upper Green River Basin Foothills and Upper Green River Basin. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Localized pockets of 24 to 28 degree overnight lows are possible, most likely around Bondurant and Farson.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly.

area.areaDesc: Upper Green River Basin; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
